data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.text: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.text: Be tolerant with others and strict with yourself.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.text: The best revenge is to not be like your enemy.

data.author: Seneca
data.text: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more in imagination than reality.

data.author: Seneca
data.text: Life is very short for those who forget the past, neglect the present, and fear the future.

data.author: Seneca
data.text: To be everywhere is to be nowhere.

data.author: Epictetus
data.text: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.

data.author: Epictetus
data.text: People are not disturbed by things, but by the view they take of them.

data.author: Epictetus
data.text: Difficulties are things that show a person what they are.

data.author: Ryan Holiday
data.text: There is no good or bad without us, there is only perception.

data.author: Ryan Holiday
data.text: There is the event itself and the story we tell ourselves about what it means.

data.author: Ryan Holiday
data.text: Never forget, within ever obstacle is an opportunity to improve our condition.
